about_the_game:
Get ready for a race against the clock where you’ll control a team of bulbs with unique abilities! In each level, you’ll help these fragile bulbs overcome obstacles, rescue their companions, and finally light up in their sockets before time runs out.

  • Teamwork: Control up to 12 bulbs at once; each one can break with a single hit or fall into pits, so cooperation and planning are key.

  • Countdown: A battery indicates how much time is left. If it runs out, the bulbs “fall asleep,” and you’ll have to start again!

  • Collectibles: Gather lightning bolts in each level to unlock up to 3 lit-bulb trophies.

  • Special Powers: Besides the regular blue bulb, you’ll also have others with unique abilities (red to power up objects, purple to turn them off, and yellow for super speed) that activate when stepping on chips scattered throughout the stages.

  • Over 100 Levels: Explore multi-floor stages with multi-level puzzles, where you’ll need to travel between different floors to solve challenges.

  • High Replayability: The bulbs’ fragility and the constant time pressure make each attempt different, encouraging you to refine your strategies.

Are you ready to embark on this puzzle-platform adventure where every second counts?

  • Special Powers: Besides the regular blue bulb, you’ll also have others with unique abilities (red to power up objects, purple to turn them off, and yellow for super speed) that activate when stepping on chips scattered throughout the stages.

  • Over 100 Levels: Explore multi-floor stages with multi-level puzzles, where you’ll need to travel between different floors to solve challenges.

  • High Replayability: The bulbs’ fragility and the constant time pressure make each attempt different, encouraging you to refine your strategies.

Are you ready to embark on this puzzle-platform adventure where every second counts?
name: Spark Quest

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i5+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 450 GTS / Radeon HD 5750
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
